column2: DTR Jumper clear for serial debugging
column3: FTDI VCC Jumper close to connect 3V3 pin on serial header to 3.3V supply
column4: I2C Pullups 10kohm resistors clear to remove
column5: Test points (SPI pins for the flash memory)
column6: RST pin connected through a 0.1uF cap to DTR for auto reset

column3: Vbatt: Single cell Lipo (charged via USB)

column2: On bootup will run program if high and bootloader if low
column3: Tied to DTR to run bootloader when reset
